contents.text: Welcome to BlueCrew, the San Francisco-based staffing platform that connects you to job opportunities straight from your phone.
If you are a worker looking for shifts, press '1'.
To create or update your profile and start receiving shift offers, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our team to assist with your profile setup.

navigationGoals: I need to complete my worker profile setup so I can start receiving shift offers immediately.
I need help completing my worker profile so I can start receiving shift offers.
I need to configure my worker profile with my skills and availability to start receiving shift notifications.
I need help filling out my BlueCrew profile so I can start getting shift offers.
I want to complete my BlueCrew profile to start getting shift offers

contents.text: To speak with a support specialist about your account, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you to a support specialist.

navigationGoals: I’m having trouble logging in; I need a support agent to fix my account access ASAP.
I want to speak with someone about a payment issue—my last shift payout hasn’t arrived.
I’m experiencing a 2FA login error; I need support to troubleshoot my account access.
I’d like to speak with someone about an issue I’m having with my worker account.
I need help updating my account information

contents.text: If you are an employer in need of staff, press '2'.
To post a new job or shift, press '1'.
Please hold while we connect you to our employer services team to post your job.

navigationGoals: I want to create and publish a new job opening for next week’s staffing.
I’d like to post a security guard shift schedule for my veteran-owned business this weekend.
I want to publish a new shift posting with role specs and schedule parameters in my employer dashboard.
I want assistance creating a new job listing to find staff for my business.
I’d like to post a new weekend physics tutoring shift

contents.text: To speak with our sales team about staffing solutions, press '2'.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I’d like to talk to sales about scalable staffing packages and pricing for my business.
I need to talk with a sales rep about arranging regular staffing solutions for my growing team.
I’d like to discuss API-based staffing integration and enterprise pricing options with sales.
I need to talk to a sales representative about staffing solutions.
I want to discuss staffing packages for lab assistants with a sales rep
